A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
For a normal film it was okay but for a Star Wars film it was awful. I would rather watch the Phantom Menace\, Jar Jar and all then see this movie again. 
   The main issues I had with the film were (without too many spoilers or getting too salty)- too much humor that was out of place and not very funny\,  too much BB 8 interference killing development of other characters\, Luke and some of the original trilogy characters were written to act contrary too their established personalities\, I found the script/ story lacking of depth and quality and had  a lot of wasted opportunity\, lightsabers yes.. but here is no duel with them ...... do I need to say why this is a problem in a star wars film?\, anything Fin did was mostly pointless in the story making you start to wonder why he  is even there.

When I saw the film I was slightly entertained but overall I was mostly disappointed. Aslo later  that night when my family asked me if I liked the movie I told them that "It was just one of many reminders that my childhood is DEAD".
